name: Pseudodragon
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 CON save or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the creature fails the save by 5 or more, it falls unconscious while poisoned in this way, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Puff of Smoke (1/Day)
actions.desc: The pseudodragon exhales a cloud of smoke in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Senses
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon's Perception is 18 when perceiving by sight, hearing, or smell.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.
